# Where AI Works: Conversations at the Intersection of AI and Industry
The Wharton School
* 5.0 (9)
* TECHNOLOGY
* UPDATED BIWEEKLY
In a world of rapid change, staying competitive requires thoughtful transformation. Where AI Works tackles the big questions shaping AI’s role in business today, cutting through the hype to deliver actionable insights for leaders. Brought to you by the Wharton School
